name: Cocolia (Complete)
description:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the Guardian of Belobog, the indisputable ruler of the Towering Citadel of Belobog.
As the Guardian, Cocolia (Complete) has inherited divine powers, giving her absolute command over the power of ice to freeze her enemies in battle.

skills.name: Chill of Bone-Piercing Coagulation
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishment of Endless Winter
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Hoarfrost of Eternal Isolation
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Wrath of Winterland Saints
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. The next action casts "Punishment of Endless Winter" on all targets.

skills.name: Reverberating Ice
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to Frozen targets and units adjacent to the target. This also removes the primary target's Frozen state. If the adjacent units are frozen, then this ability is used again on the primary target.

skills.name: Intensifying Cold
skills.description: The unit and all summoned objects gain slightly increased DMG for each Frozen target on the enemy team. This DMG boosting effect is stackable.
